constituent: diagonal, scales, too much, umbrella, potato, small, mmeasuring cup, big dipper, The Plough, drop, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: The main bar of an old-fashioned scale(balance) will be very diagonal if you place a giant measuring cup on one side.
koohiiStory2: The constellation of libra (meaning " scales" in latin) is diagonal to the handle of the big dipper.
words:
傾斜(けいしゃ): inclination, slant, slope, bevel, list, dip
斜面(しゃめん): slope, slanting surface, bevel
斜(はす): aslant, oblique, diagonal
斜め(ななめ): obliqueness
